docs.title: CNRM-ESM2-1e
docs.text:
Earth System Model CNRM-ESM2-1e

CNRM Earth System Model Version 2 — Emission-driven Configuration

Release Year 2018 Model Family cnrm-cm Validation Key cnrm-esm2-1e Context JSON-LD ↗

docs.title: Description
docs.text:
CNRM-ESM2-1e is the CNRM Earth System model version 2 designed for CMIP6 on the basis of the physical core CNRM-CM6-1 (Voldoire et al. 2019). In concentration mode, it is the same model as CNRM-ESM2-1 (Séférian et al. 2019), it only differs from CNRM-ESM2-1 in emission-driven mode (see Bossert et al. 2026).

The main adaptations consist in a better conservation of the carbon in all the components leading to a more consistent/realistic carbon flux evolution in historical simulations.

docs.title: Model Components
docs.text:
Aerosol Dynamic alias: aerosol

Aerosol processes and atmospheric particulate matter dynamics

Atmosphere Dynamic alias: atmos

Atmospheric circulation and thermodynamics

Atmospheric Chemistry Dynamic key: atmospheric_chemistry

Chemical processes and reactions in the atmosphere

Land Surface Dynamic key: land_surface

Terrestrial surface processes and land-atmosphere interactions

Ocean Dynamic alias: ocean

Ocean circulation and physical oceanography

Ocean Biogeochemistry Dynamic key: ocean_biogeochemistry

Marine biogeochemical cycles and carbon dynamics

Sea Ice Dynamic key: sea_ice

Sea ice formation, extent, and dynamics

Land Ice Omitted key: land_ice

Ice sheets and glaciers (not included in this configuration)

docs.title: Calendar System
docs.text:
Standard (Gregorian) gregorian

Mixed Gregorian/Julian calendar as defined by UDUNITS. This is the default calendar assumed if no calendar attribute is specified. A deprecated alternative name for this calendar is 'gregorian'.

Identifier standard Validation Key standard Types wcrp:calendar, universal

docs.title: Technical Details
docs.text: Resource Identifier (@id) cnrm-esm2-1e JSON-LD Context emd.mipcvs.dev/model/cnrm-esm2-1e.json Resource Types (@type) emd wcrp:model esgvoc:Model

View Raw JSON-LD 
{
  "@context": "https://emd.mipcvs.dev/model/cnrm-esm2-1e.json",
  "@id": "cnrm-esm2-1e",
  "@type": ["emd", "wcrp:model", "esgvoc:Model"],
  "calendar": {
    "@id": "standard",
    "@type": ["wcrp:calendar", "esgvoc:Calendar", "universal"],
    "alias": "gregorian",
    "description": "Mixed Gregorian/Julian calendar as defined by UDUNITS...",
    "ui_label": "Standard (Gregorian)",
    "validation_key": "standard"
  },
  "description": "CNRM-ESM2-1e is the CNRM Earth System model version 2...",
  "dynamic_components": ["aerosol", "atmosphere", "atmospheric_chemistry", 
                         "land_surface", "ocean", "ocean_biogeochemistry", "sea_ice"],
  "family": "cnrm-cm",
  "name": "CNRM-ESM2-1e",
  "omitted_components": "land_ice",
  "release_year": 2018,
  "validation_key": "cnrm-esm2-1e"
}
